name: Fun Hospital - Tycoon's Back
description:
You are invited to build a fantastic theme hospital! Build a hospital with your smart strategy NOW! And expand it to the most famous and supreme hospital in the world!

The theme of hospital is bringing you back to the old times and having tons of fun! Being a hospital tycoon, you'll need to build rooms, hire doctors, and manage everything well to treat all kinds of crazy, funny & weird patients according to their disease. Always make sure your doctors and patients are in good conditions, and make good use of various buildings and items to make them feel happy and comfortable! Everything in your hospital is under your control!

Run your hospital like a tycoon! Unlock new plots, upgrade technologies, build various rooms and facilities, make money from patients and have fun!

Enjoy your time in fun hospital with hundreds of cute little characters: poor girl, bald man, naughty kid, strange aliens, evil guy, humorous super heroes… their destinies are in your hand! Various attributes & status and excellent AI for different type of characters. There's always more secrets to explore in fun hospital!

Tycoon’s back! Play with people all over the world in this amazing online buildings & sim game!

PLAYER REVIEWS:

***** Decent little game old school memories of theme hospital defo worth a ponder!

***** I have been waiting for a game like this on IOS devices for ages that was actually good. Thank god I don’t have to wait any longer.

***** Great time killer! Classic theme & tycoon game style. Funny as hell!

FEATURES:
- Online real time strategy, play with your friends!
- Build, design and decorate your hospital according to your preferences
- Manage everything in your hospital & staff like a real boss
- Weird & imaginative representations of diseases
- More Doctors, patients, facilities and plots unlocked while hospital level up!
- Excellent character AI, various character status.
- Challenge stages and compete with your friends!
